alert.note: Alert for Camden; Gates; Pasquotank (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 04 at 7:44PM EDT until May 04 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Camden County in northeastern North Carolina... Northwestern Pasquotank County in northeastern North Carolina... Eastern Gates County in northeastern North Carolina... * Until 815 PM EDT. * At 744 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Sunbury, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Sunbury around 750 PM EDT. Hobbsville around 800 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Sandy Cross, Easons Crossroads, Carter, Acorn Hill, Savage and Trotville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.
